snippet: Ohio State forward Jared Sullinger has benefited greatly by playing in summer pickup basketball games with former Buckeyes players, starting in ninth grade.
abstract: Profile of Ohio State men's basketball forward Jared Sullinger, who benefited greatly from playing in summer pickup games with his older brother J J and other former Buckeyes players, starting in ninth grade.
lead_paragraph: Ohio State forward Jared Sullinger has benefited greatly by playing in summer pickup basketball games with former Buckeyes players, starting in ninth grade.

headline.seo: Former Buckeyes Made Jared Sullinger a Student of the Game
headline.main: Student of the Game, Educated by Ex-Buckeyes
headline.print_headline: A Student of the Game, Educated by Ex-Buckeyes
